type.description: Type of link. Well-known values: `privacy_policy`, `terms_of_service`, `refund_policy`, `shipping_policy`, `faq`. Consumers SHOULD handle unknown values gracefully by displaying them using the `title` field or omitting the link.

url.description: The actual URL pointing to the content to be displayed.

title.description: Optional display text for the link. When provided, use this instead of generating from type.
